summary:
Based on the information provided in the RFP data chunks, the primary objectives and goals of the project are to empanel software development firms for e-Governance projects in the Government of Odisha. The project aims to implement ICT initiatives in government departments by partnering with local firms in Odisha.

Key technological requirements and specifications include the need for software development expertise, particularly in areas such as GIS development and mobile app development. The project also requires agencies to demonstrate technical skills and prioritize quoted technologies.

Critical functional needs and desired outcomes include comprehensive system analysis, implementation and testing, system integration, and application support. The project requires agencies to provide project citations and demonstrate their ability to meet the specified requirements.

Compliance and regulatory standards include the adherence to the code of integrity, which prohibits bribery, misrepresentation, collusion, and improper use of information. Empanelled firms must comply with the terms and conditions outlined in the RFP document.

The specific industry/domain focus of the project is e-Governance in the Government of Odisha. The project aims to enhance government processes and service delivery through the use of technology and software solutions.

Major deliverables include the empanelment of software development firms, who will be responsible for the development and implementation of ICT projects in government departments. Specific timelines for deliverables may be mentioned in the RFP document.

In terms of compliance, bidders are required to submit various forms and documents, including the Bid Security Declaration Form and compliance sheets for pre-qualification and technical proposals. The project also mentions the jurisdiction of the High Court of Odisha for dispute resolution.

Overall, the project seeks to select qualified software development firms through a transparent bidding process to enhance e-Governance initiatives in the Government of Odisha.
